Info............: The adventures of the various inhabitants of an underground civilization.

Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.

READNFO stuff:

To our surprise ABC Family aired the Bells of Fraggle Rock episode as widescreen, when normally
they air fullscreen content in that aspect ratio. We leeched the DVDRip to compare and here's our
observations between the two:

-The DVD has more picture on the top and bottom, while the HDTV copy has more on the left and right. we stuck a comparison image in our sample dir.
-The HDTV copy is clearer
-The DVD was encoded at 29fps while the recording was clearly 23fps...although there's time time compression blends
-The HDTV copy is cut for time (not to mention has a monster bitrate)

So pick and choose. If you like to collect Fraggle Rock, here's a shitty "remastered" widescreen version for ya.

BTW: Some guides say "The Bells of Fraggle Rock" is S03E01 whereas Wikipedia and FFNDVD tagged it as S03E22 - Fraggle.Rock.S03E22.DVDRip.XviD-FFNDVD
S03E01 is the correct one, so we're tagging it so...

Keeping all of this in mind, we're going to internal this and the 720p copy
